EmailTemplate.description: Reminder template to be sent during a survey, when contact can not find the invitation anymore.
EmailTemplate.name: IND NPS REMINDER Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.NPS_Subjects__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Providing an extraordinary customer experience is highly important to us at TE Connectivity and is something we continually strive to optimize. Therefore we are undertaking a series of surveys with our most valued customers to track our performance and to improve it wherever possible. Recently, we invited you to participate in our NPS Survey.
{!Contact.External_NPS_Survey_Link__c}
We would appreciate your feedback.
If you wish to unsubscribe from further TE NPS Surveys, please click on following link to set the "Opt Out" flag.
{!Contact.External_NPS_OPT_OUT_link__c} Please do not reply to this message.
Kind Regards, Your TE Connectivity Team
